title: The Adventures of Victor Simmons: Mentor of Might

story.text: Victor Simmons discovers an ancient tome beneath the library where he mentors, which grants him the power to amplify others' potential.
After experimenting with his powers at a local school, he helps a struggling student become a math genius, surprising her teachers and classmates.
Victor stops a robbery using his powers to boost the courage and strength of a nearby security guard, who apprehends the thieves.
At a science fair, Victor helps a demotivated young inventor perfect a renewable energy device, which wins first place.
Victor is challenged by a mysterious villain who envies his ability and attempts to steal the ancient tome.
In a dramatic confrontation, Victor uses his gift to empower the people around him, turning the crowd into a force capable of repelling the villain.
Reflecting on his week, Victor commits to using his powers for good, setting up a non-profit, 'Potential Unleashed', to reach more people.

ending: Victor Simmons continued to inspire and empower, proving that the true strength of a hero lies in lifting others.
moral: The greatest power is found in empowering others.
